turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning Felix, how are you doing?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good morning, I'm a little under the weather and very tired.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Aw, that's to bad sir, anything I can get for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well I've been craving this coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, how about the Iced Cinnamon Shortbread latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So a protein box and a grande iced cinnmon shortbread latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You know what I'll just make an order and it will be ready for pickup at the store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thanks for making that adjustment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which store will it be ready for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready Inside the starbucks at Ralphs .

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are the cross streets Milliken and Church street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Al right I'm on my way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and see you soon.
